question: 家賃
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>house</kanji> <kanji>rent</kanji> is your <vocabulary>house rent</vocabulary>, though it can be your apartment rent too.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>家</ja> is an exceptional one. It is <ja>や</ja>, because when your landlord asks if you paid your rent, you always say <reading>yah</reading> (<ja>や</ja>), whether you did or not.
